aspect_ratio_scss.description: Pomocné utility pro zachování poměru (např. obrázku) pomocí vlastně `padding-bottom` triku a absolutního pozicování uvnitř relativního rodiče.…

gulpfile.description: Common gulpfile for my projects. It dynamically loads configuration from `package.json` and tasks from `./gulp/tasks/`. More description __TBD__.

gulp_cleanJSHINT.description: Utility for using in combination with `gulp_place` (see `filesCleaner` key in argument object).

gulp_place.description: Returned function 'gulp_place' must be used in gulp.pipe and replacing 'gulp_place' in source files by another files content or eval inputed data (i.e. variables inside gulpfile).…

gulp_place_type.description: Temporaly workaround for type definition for [jaandrle/gulp-place](https://github.com/jaandrle/gulp-place).

jsonDoc.description: Naive script for searching JSONs for given files and generating documentations based on templates. More description __TBD__.

gulp_task_config.description: Gulp task for generating cordovas `config.xml`. More description __TBD__.

gulp_task_css.description: Gulp task for processing `*.css` and fonts (see line 24). More description __TBD__.

gulp_task_default.description: Main/default gulp task for serializing others tasks scripts. More description __TBD__.

gulp_task_html.description: Gulp task for processing `*.html` files in `html/` subdirectory inside `app.directories.src`. More description __TBD__.

gulp_task_img.description: Gulp task for processing images in `img/` subdirectory inside `app.directories.src`. More description __TBD__.

gulp_task_javascript-libs.description: Gulp task for processing `*.js` in `js_libs/` subdirectory inside `app.directories.src`. More description __TBD__.

gulp_task_javascript.description: Gulp task for processing `*.js` in `js/` subdirectory inside `app.directories.src`. More description __TBD__.

gulp_task_run_cordova_wrapper.description: Gulp task for running cordova commands (using your own win/mac/linux script defined in `app.shared.cordova_wrapper`).…

jsconfig.description: Just `jsconfig.json` config primary for VS Code editor.

gulp_task_javascript_lib.description: Gulp task for processing `*.js` in `app.directories.src`. It also validate non `*.min.js` output files (in `app.directories.bin`). More description __TBD__.
